Name: Genetic Fluff
About the game: Genetic Fluff is a multiplayer Action-RPG creature collection adventure game. You play as time traveling outlanders Elio, Ada, Sten and Aster, each making their way through other worldly adventures. Our outlander heroes are guided by their abilities to use Genetic Fluff and their Genetic Fluff companion 'Gene'. You will collect and build up your Genetic Fluff creature collection gaining experience and leveling up during battle. Find special items and discover untold mysteries in a real-time action adventure that you and your friends/family can complete together or alone with local multiplayer support. Defeat Bosses in battle and skillfully avoid Enemies in the many conflicts you will encounter on your way through space and time. Features: ARPG (Action RPG) Creature Collection Gain Experience Level Up Local Split Screen Multiplayer for up to 4 players (including yourself) Unleash and Level Up your Genetic Fluff Companions during battle to help you defeat your enemies Full Controller Support for the desired tactile feel of a beat-em-up action adventure game (with keyboard still as an option and mouse support for menus) Punch, Kick, Headbutt, Dash, Jump and use your Genetic Fluff powers to fight your way through levels and bosses, each with their own story and agenda Jump-Attack Flying and higher altitude opponents Jump and Dash to avoid moving obstacles and projectiles Spawn, Pick-up, Throw, Slide, Slam, and gently set down creatures with the help of your Genetic Fluff powers Characters and Creatures are equipped with unique Projectiles Collect Items and Loot for quests and to heal/power-up Game Progress is automatically saved after each Stage is complete (Note: Items are not saved and are lost when restarting the game.) Portals are available after completion of milestones to make it easy to continue your adventure Controller or Keyboard Mapping: 'Up' : Joystick Up or 'W' 'Down' : Joystick Down or 'S' 'Left' : Joystick Left or 'A' 'Right' : Joystick Right or 'D' 'Attack - Joy Directional / Return Item (to inventory) / Slam Creature (if holding)' : X or 'J' 'Jump / Throw Creature (if holding) / Select Item (if item selection is open) / Join Game' : A or 'Spacebar' 'Jump Ground Attack - Charged Jump' : hold A or hold 'Spacebar' 'Jump Attack - Charged Jump + Attack' : hold (A + X) or hold ('Spacebar' + 'J') 'Jump Dash Attack - Charged Jump + Run' : hold (A + B) or hold ('Spacebar' + 'K') 'Dash / Ram / Slide Creature (if holding) - Charged Run' : B or 'K' 'Spawn Creature / Pickup Creature / Set Down Creature' : Y or 'L' 'Pickup and Slam Creature' : (Y + X) or ('L' + 'J') 'Pickup and Slide Creature' : (Y + B) or ('L' + 'K') 'Pickup and Throw Creature' : (Y + A) or ('L' + 'Spacebar') 'Open Items' : L1, L2 or 'E' 'Close Items' : Esc, L1, L2 or 'E' 'Open Game Menu' : Start or Enter 'Close Game Menu' : Start, Esc or Enter 'Switch Character / Join Game' : R1, R2, Select or Shift Keyboard Only: 'Show / Hide - Closed Captioning' : F1 'Fullscreen Window / Resizable Window' : F2 Controller, Keyboard and Local Multiplayer Notes: Player 1 always uses the Keyboard and Controller 1 Multiple Controllers are needed for two, three and four Players simultaneously (i.e. Four (4) Xbox Controllers are needed for 4-Player gameplay) When Controller is Enabled (plugged in to computer), most Keyboard gameplay buttons are Disabled (except for Enter, F1, F2, and Menu Navigation keys when the Menu is open)
